about_the_game:
The Guacamelee! 2 Original Soundtrack!

Featuring music by Peter Chapman (aka Coins), Rom Di Prisco and special guests Mariachi Entertainment System. Includes 32 brand-new original tracks, plus bonus tracks!

Comes in 320 kbps MP3 format.

Featuring music by Peter Chapman (aka Coins), Rom Di Prisco and special guests Mariachi Entertainment System. Includes 32 brand-new original tracks, plus bonus tracks!
